name: cheap rum
detailedDescription:
It's pretty ropey. Best used for cooking and not much else.
I'm sure most people wouldn't notice though.

attributes.smell: It smells like a mixture of farmyards and paint stripper. Maybe that's why this stuff's sometimes called agricultural rum.
attributes.taste:
As you bring it up to your mouth the smell overpowers your senses.
There's every chance it's just fine but this definitely isn't rum designed for tasting
